chunk:
Neutrogena Stubborn Texture Daily Cleanser

Brand: Neutrogena

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Active Ingredients: Salicylic Acid 1.0%; Inactive Ingredients: WATER, SODIUM C14-16 OLEFIN SULFONATE, COCAMIDOPROPYL HYDROXYSULTAINE, SORBITOL, GLYCOLIC ACID, GLUCONOLACTONE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, POTASSIUM ACRYLATES COPOLYMER, DISODIUM EDTA
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
